channel.description: i need help now i added bandos whip and some gs but now i get black screen when i log in. i removed the stuff but its still black :| hmm im using chrisscape client and str3ghtscap3 as source

please

@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“Sp3ke, post:4, topic:302066”]This is why you should backup you’re files.

But from what it sounds like when you added the items you must of used item.cfg, which sounds like you’ve used the spacebar instead of tab or you accidently put a space somewhere. Gunna be hard to fix that one bro, good luck.[/quote]
He might not have added the models.

item.title: I log into a black screen!
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

What else did you recently add.

FOR THE FUTURE: Make your titles somewhat BETTER… “help me now please!” doesn’t get much attention due to the fact that we have no idea what you need help WITH from reading the title.
Something like “I log in to a black screen?” would be better.
Just make sure your titles relate somewhat to the problem at hand, for the future.

I’m almost certain I read somewhere that it’s a rule (I think) to have clarity in your titles so as to let people know what the problem truely is before reading spam or something they can’t help with. I think.

Read full topic
